channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Button not working . You press it and pedestrian lights never activate and the button does not illuminate, 9th September
item.description:
As per picture, opposite the Brewery and opposite side to NCP on the corner of Monson Avenue and St Margaret street. It’s the light that you use to cross St Margaret’s street NOT to cross Monson Avenue.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Monson Avenue, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 9th September
item.description:
ARBS TEAM PLEASE CUT BRANCHES 1 X TREE ROAD CLOSURE NOT MARKED (Overgrown Tree)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 9th September
item.description:

item.title: 2 drains blocked, water taken 30 to 40 minutes to go down drains resulting in road flooded., 9th September
item.description:
Drain outside driveway of Mercian Court Number 46 Park Place and drain outside Park Gate next door in Park Place affected, very slow to drain causing the road to be flooded. This causes water to back up in the drain passing under Mercian Court property and has resulted in the flooding of apartments in the past.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, Park Place, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
